titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the publique fast the eighth of March, in St Maries Oxford, before the great assembly of the members of the honourable House of Commons there assembled. By Gryffith Williams L. Bishop of Ossory: and published by their speciall command.
titleStmt.author: Williams, Gryffith, 1589?-1672.

notesStmt.note: [3] p. at end = "How the rebels dealt with the Bishop while he was preaching this sermon".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
